frontmatter.courseTitle: Deploying WordPress and MySql with Persistent Volumes with Meshery
frontmatter.description: Learn how to deploy WordPress and MySQL with persistent volumes with Meshery Playground
In this section you will create and configure Persistent Volumes, Persistent Volume Claims and a Secret for the Database.
